Package org.apache.jmeter.reporters

Class Summary
AbstractListenerElement  
FileReporter This class loads data from a saved file and displays statistics about it.
MailerModel The model for a MailerVisualizer.
MailerResultCollector  
ResultAction ResultAction - take action based on the status of the last Result
ResultCollector  
ResultSaver Save Result responseData to a set of files TODO - perhaps save other items such as headers?
Summariser Generate a summary of the test run so far to the log file and/or standard output.
